definition: to point out/to remind (sb of sth)/to suggest/suggestion/tip/reminder/notice
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment

sentences.english: He deposits ten dollars, and the computer lights up and asks for the urine sample.
sentences.chinese: 付過10塊錢後，電腦啓動了，並提示他提供尿樣。

sentences.english: It suggested that SM could be regarded as a good exogenous scavenger of oxygen free radical.
sentences.chinese: 提示丹蔘可作爲一良好的外源性氧自由基清除劑。

sentences.english: Supported user-defined unread notification of automatical protection.
sentences.chinese: 支持用戶自定義的新未讀消息彈出提示。

sentences.english: These results suggest that pathway which cancer cells entered lymphatics was mainly by destructing walls of lymphatics.
sentences.chinese: 提示癌細胞進入淋巴管的途徑以破壞管壁爲主。

sentences.english: Blood Pact now has a tooltip.
sentences.chinese: 血之契印現在有了一個提示。

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合併弓形蟲感染的可能性。

sentences.english: It can indicate ink low and ink finish.
sentences.chinese: 具有墨量低和墨盡提示功能。

sentences.english: The auctioneer's services are paid for in the form of …
sentences.chinese: 提示了這一段講的是拍賣人所得的利潤。

sentences.english: Choroidal folds in the macular area suggest hypotony .
sentences.chinese: 黃斑區脈絡膜皺褶提示張力減退。

sentences.english: So it has certain anti senile effect in brain.
sentences.chinese: 提示，健腦益腎沖劑具有一定的抗腦衰作用。

sentences.english: How exactly did he prompt her, Mr Markham?
sentences.chinese: 確切地說，他是怎樣提示她的，馬卡姆先生？

sentences.english: Reports of variation in the stool pattern with certain elements of the diet suggest dietary intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 大便形態各異伴未消化食物提示爲飲食不耐受。

sentences.english: Calcium formate may offer significant advantages as a dietary calcium supplement.
sentences.chinese: 提示甲酸鈣可能是一種極有優勢的鈣補充劑。

sentences.english: Documents must be presented for negotiation within 10 days after shipment date.
sentences.chinese: 單據須正在拆船後10天內提示議付。

sentences.english: The results of RAPD analysis suggest that the genus Agkistrodon is a highly differentiated group.
sentences.chinese: RAPD分析結果提示蝮屬是一個高度分化的類羣。

sentences.english: From above, we can cue that cocaine has long toxicity effect on CNS.
sentences.chinese: 這提示可卡因的神經毒性作用具有長時程效應。

definition: to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to take note of/to pay attention to
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
